transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haanji sir good morning, Neha baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Good morning.
Customer: Haanji bolo bolo.
Executive: Ji kaise ho aap?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Kaise ho aap?
Customer: Bas badhiya aap batao na.
Executive: Badhiya sir kaise chal raha hai sir abhi services aapki?
Customer: Abhi thoda moda inquiry chalu hua pehle to kuch bhi nahi aa raha.
Executive: Pehle nahi aa raha tha na wo to sahi hai.
Customer: Lekin madam aap nahi manoge ke abhi mai samne baitha hu.
Customer: Abhi second bhi nahi hota hai tab inquiry chala jata hai to aise to thodi nahi chalega aise to koi bhagwan ha bhagwan to hai nahi ki chalo samne dekha hai to bhi chala jata notification nahi aata.
Customer: Kam se kam notice notification time me to koi nahi purchase kar lega na.
Executive: Ji ji ji aur sir actually kya hota hai na premium categories hoti hai jaise hi aapke pass lead aati hai wo within a second sold out ho jati hai to notification aane me.
Customer: To koi matlab hi nahi hai koi matlab hi nahi hai madam second me jo sold out to aapko kuch.
Executive: Usi liye maine aapko bataya tha jab hamari video meeting hui thi na aapne video meeting ka concern raise kiya tha to aapko yaad hoga maine aapko paas lead ka bataya tha ki sir aap apni na paas lead pe I am interested mark karte raha karo usse thoda sa.
Customer: Achcha wo wo type ka wo type ka inquiry aayega aisa.
Customer: Ab wo to kar hi raha hu wo to mujhe agli bar jab package kiya tha na tabhi bataya tha to mai to wo to kar hi raha hu.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul.
Customer: Usme matlab aisa hota hai chhot isme aisa hota hai paas lead me jo 30 30 ka inquiry hai wo select karunga to waisa aayega.
Customer: 2000 piece ka karunga wo.
Executive: Sir ye matlab hota hai ha uska ye matlab hota hai ki aisi lead aapko chahiye thi but ye sold out ho gayi hai.
Customer: Nahi aisi aisi lead ke liye wo hota hai na baki mai 25 piece ka inquiry wo I am interested karu to 25 ka hi aayega ya to 5000 ka hai to bhi aayega.
Executive: Nahi nahi quantity ki guarantee nahi hoti ki aapko 25 hi piece aayenge kya pata usse jyada aa jaye.
Customer: Meri baat hi nahi samajh rahe ho yaar.
Executive: Batao batao aap batao.
Customer: Wo mai 25 ka maine sir I am interested select kiya paas lead me.
Customer: To matlab wo wo inquiry se koi wo select kiya to unse koi dikkat nahi hai na 5000 wali bhi aayegi ke 25 25 ka hi aayega wo puch raha hu.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul mai wahi bol rahi hu ki aisa nahi hai ki aap 25 wala karoge to 25 hi aayegi kya pata 10000 aa jaye kya pata 5000 aa jaye badh ke bhi aa sakta hai.
Customer: Ab badh ke aayega na 25 25 ka select karta rahunga to 25 hi nahi aayega na aisa bol raha hu.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi aisa nahi hai.
Customer: Aisa nahi hai.
Executive: Aap sir apne paas lead pe apna focus rakho thik hai aur yaha pe jo categories jaise maine us din aapko bola tha mai aapki mapping wagera sahi karungi to maine ki thi to jiski wajah se aapko kuch inquiries aane start hui hai ab dheere dheere karke kyuki jab aaj hum agar aapka catalog sahi karte hai na sir to teen char din baad hi stable hoti hai sari chije aisa nahi hai ki aaj hum thik karenge to usi time aapko inquiry aayegi wo teen char din lagte hai catalog ko proper thik hone me hai na to ye sari chije hai aur aapka humne group bhi banaya ek whatsapp pe hai na to aapko jab bhi ha jab bhi aisa kabhi lagega ki mujhe inquiry nahi aa rahi hai ya leads me koi dikkat hai aapne us group me update karna sari chije.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai kar aur ek chij sir aur thi actually kya tha na hamari us din aapne video meeting ke liye concern raise kiya tha to video meeting hamari sari ho gayi thi but aapne matlab kya hua hamari baat hui thi na to waha pe aapne na matlab feedback aaya hoga aapko whatsapp pe.
Customer: Ha wo kar diya maine.
Executive: Ha wo aapne no satisfy kar diya tha to.
Customer: Nahi fir baad me kar diya baad me kar diya maine satisfy wo galti se ho gaya.
Executive: Ha wo ek bar hi aata hai actually ye dikkat thi but koi baat nahi ye kya hota hai na actually wo aapki aur hamari video meeting pe kya baat hui uska interaction puchhte hai hum aapke ki video meeting kaisi thi kaisi nahi thi.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo kar diya hu ek bar to bataya maine aapko bar bar batana padta hai.
Executive: Koi baat nahi.
Customer: Ek bar to bataya wo galti se to ho gaya tha.
Executive: Abhi batao abhi kaha pe kya chije hai jo aapki correct karni hai mai wo sahi karwa deti hu aur fir aapka ye wala jo concern hai wo maine band karna tha sir ye kafi time se open tha video meeting ke liye na kyuki video meeting to ho gayi.
Customer: Band kar do.
Executive: To aapko aaj thik hai aaj aapko ek feedback aaya tha sir aaj dhyan se satisfy kar dijiyega aaj hi wo mat kariyega thik hai aur koi dikkat hai aapko leads me abhi ya koi product add karwana batao mujhe abhi.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi koi parwah nahi.
Executive: Koi product add nahi karwana abhi?
Customer: Nahi karwa dijiye nahi karwa.
Executive: Thik hai to abhi mai aapki leads check kar rahi thi waha pe paas lead ke sath mujhe do teen leads aapki dikh rahi thi aisi jo aapke matlab ki ho sakti hai quantity achchi hai.
Customer: Quantity wali mujhe bhejo na quantity wali mujhe bhejo na.
Executive: Mai aapko quantity wali bhej deti hu aur mai paas lead ka screenshot bhi bhejti hu usme aap I am interested.
Customer: Paas lead to mai dekh raha hu paas paas lead to mai dekh sakta hu aisa koi nahi.
Executive: Ha wo lead.
Customer: Paas lead ka koi matlab hi nahi hai.
Executive: Thik hai aur lead maine jo check kara aapne?
Customer: Lead maine nahi kiya ha kiya check.
Executive: Waha pe jo maine aapko bataya tha.
Customer: Do do teen inquiry hai 30 30 30 ka.
Executive: Ha waha pe thumbs up kar dena aur reply kar dijiyega aapko thik hai baki mai aapka ye concern abhi sir close kar rahi hu isse aap matlab positive dena sir is bar feedback aur mai aapko group me update karti rahungi.
Customer: Regular regular inquiry aana chahiye ek mahina 15 din aayega fir band ho jayega koi matlab nahi kyuki humne 12 month one year ka payment kiya hai.
Customer: Aap jab package kiya 10 15 din inquiry koi matlab nahi.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Thik hai ji sir mai aapko do teen chije whatsapp group me bhi bhej deti hu thik hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving regular inquiries.

- Wants to ensure correct lead selection process.

- Expressed dissatisfaction with video meeting feedback process.



Resolution:

- Executive explained lead filtering and notification process.

- Executive confirmed quantity of leads can vary.

- Executive offered to correct any issues.

- Executive closed the video meeting concern.

- Executive will send leads with good quantity on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide positive feedback.

- Executive will provide updates in the WhatsApp group.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, video meeting, feedback, whatsapp group
